meanings.sent1: The police found a hidden stash of poteen in the old barn.
meanings.sent2: At the party, they passed around bottles of poteen for everyone to try.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leprechaun offered the detective a sip of poteen as a clue.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of poteen filled the room, transporting me back to the Irish countryside.
meanings.sent5: The taste of poteen was so strong, it felt like a fiery dance on my tongue.

meanings.definition: A strong alcoholic drink made from potatoes or grain.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always said her homemade poteen was the best in the county.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying the local poteen for a true taste of Ireland.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a splash of poteen to the stew for an extra kick of flavor.
meanings.sent4: The poteen flowed like a river at the festival, warming everyone up on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The label on the bottle promised a smooth finish, but the poteen packed a punch.
